pma:database.name: world
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `produce` ( `transaction_date` date DEFAULT NULL, `category_code` varchar(3) DEFAULT NULL, `crop_code` varchar(5) DEFAULT NULL, `crop_name` varchar(12) DEFAULT NULL, `market_code` int(3) DEFAULT NULL, `market_name` varchar(4) DEFAULT NULL, `highest_price` decimal(5,1) DEFAULT NULL, `median_price` decimal(5,1) DEFAULT NULL, `lowest_price` decimal(5,1) DEFAULT NULL, `average_price` decimal(5,2) DEFAULT NULL, `transaction_volume` decimal(7,1) DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
